attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you’re not a, criminal, under aged thug, paedophile, illegal immigrant, I believe you have less civil rights under the Human Rights Act then they do.
Many illegal immigrants are allowed to stay in this country when found because of the human rights act, despite, sometimes, being criminals and or a threat to this country.
I believe one of the biggest factors of injustice is the Human Rights Act. This act makes criminals victims and shackles the authorities when trying to deal with them .
